version_description:
- iOS 11 optimizations
- Improved syncing
- Improved Hunt Area management
Performance improvements
Performance improvements
Friend Locator improvements
Performance improvements
Performance improvements

- Improved Hunt Area management
- Improved Parcel Info
- New Topo map with offline availability
- Improved friend requests
- iPhone X optimizations
- Improved Topo map images

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• HuntStand now requires iOS 10.3 and later.
• Fixed some display issues so that HuntStand will use your screen real estate properly on newer iPhones and iPads.
• Lots of changes to improve usability.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Search by Address in Manage Hunt Areas is working again.
• Fixed the topo map so it doesn't zoom out unexpectedly.
• The last-selected, then unselected, map pin will no longer disappear when you zoom the map. (It wasn't really gone, just hiding.)
• Fixed some app crashes that affected a few folks.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Fixed an issue that caused hunt areas with an especially large number of map items to fail sync.
• The current hunt area is now displayed at the top of the list so you don't have to scroll down to find it.
• Newly-added lines and shapes weren't removed from the map if they were deleted until you left and returned to the Mapping section. Now they are.
• Fixed an issue where sighting types weren't being displayed when setting up a new sighting.
• The harvests, sightings and trailcams are now display in lists from newest to oldest.
• Filtering map objects now correctly hides items that are filtered out.
• Fixed the wind speed graph so that speed labels don't get clipped.
• Improvements to the subscription purchase workflow for enabling paid app features.
• HuntStand now only asks to use your location while it's running. We weren't trying to be nosy.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Fixed a bug that prevented the purchase of an unlimited parcels subscription in some cases.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Fixed an issue that prevented some changes made to boundaries on the website from being synched to the app.
• The hunt area editor is now working correctly for iOS 10 users.
• The hunt zone wind speed graph is properly updated.
• Placements in the Trail Cams section are now badged with the number of photos associated with each camera.
• Fixed an issue that prevented the trail cam sunrise/sunset/moonrise/moonset time from being displayed properly.
• The wrong detail to be displayed when a harvest or sighting was tapped in those sections. That wasn't intuitive so now the right one is displayed.
• If you synched the hunt area currently being displayed on a map then the map would reset its center and zoom. That’s really annoying so we stopped doing it.
• Editing some harvest details was not working correctly. That is now fixed.
• Squashed some issues that resulted in crashes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Added a revolutionary soil tool that provides useful details about what’s in your ground. To view, select a shape from your mapping screen and tap “Show Soil Data”.
• Squashed some issues that resulted in crashes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Improved location management to reduce power consumption at times when the app doesn’t need to know your current location.
• Fixed some crashes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Fixed an issue that prevented HuntStand from determining your current location in some cases.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.
• Removed a restriction that prevented you from being able to work with maps if location services is disabled.
• Fixed a crash when retrieving parcel info support counties by state.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• More helpful error message when trying to share a hunt area that has already been shared.
• This will be the last version to support iOS 10, and thus the last version that will run on 32-bit devices such as the iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, and the fourth-generation iPad. To get the latest feature updates, performance improvements and bug fixes, please upgrade to iOS 11.1 or later.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• HuntStand now requires iOS 11.1 or later.
• Introducing a new streamlined design and incredible new features. Upgrade to HuntStand Pro and gain access to unlimited nationwide public and private parcel boundaries, our propriety Hunting Lands layer and Public Lands layer, a one of a kind Tree Coverage layer, 3 different detailed satellite layers, true 3D mode, and much more. Join the hunting revolution!

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Improved offline weather info caching.
• Fixed some issues with the map objects filter.
• Friend Locator was not displaying friend locations until location sharing was turned off and back on.
• Added a "clear" button when adding or measuring lines or shapes so that it's easier to start over.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Added back in the trail cam delete button, which apparently went into hiding.
• Trail cams are visible, both in the map objects tab as well as the trail cams tab.
• In addition to tapping on the map, you can also specify a street address/location for parcel info queries.
• When measuring or adding a line, the line length is displayed after the first point is added instead of after the second.
• Added an option to the home screen to allow you to lay out the tiles either in the new horizontally-scrolling strip or the classic version.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Weather updates for the solunar and weather sections should be working better now.
• Markers now appear in the Map Objects list, in addition to lines and shapes.
• Fixed a database migration issue that was affecting some folks who hadn't previously updated HuntStand in a while.
• Reset password was sometimes getting confused. Now it should be more clear-headed.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• The map remembers its last position for each of your hunt areas during the current app run so you can pick up where you left off.
• Moved the trace path button so it's visible directly on the map rather than as one of the “add” options. Some folks were having a problem finding it previously, even though it wasn’t trying to play hide-and-seek.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Map tiles should have a better chance of appearing when using HuntStand in an area with a poor network connection.
• Addressed a crash for devices running iOS 11 or 12.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Tracing a path now lets you do other things while the trace is in progress. Tap the Trace button and start the trace. You can hide the trace panel and add other markers, lines, or shapes. Or leave the map screen and go check the weather or the latest in your activity feed. When you’re done tracing, tap the Trace button in the Map Editor and it will let you save the path.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Fixed an issue where the friend search could display an error message when it shouldn't.
• Fixed a sync issue affecting some folks who migrated from Scoutlook.
• Bug fixes.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Added the HuntStand Media video channel.
• Offline satellite map: select an area and the map for that area will be downloaded so that you can use it even without a network connection.

What’s new:
• Vivid Satellite map is back.

What’s new:
• Adjusted the filtering of GPS locations to reduce the amount of jitter when tracing a path.
• Display the area (imperial or metric) that will be covered as you zoom and position the map in the offline map editor.
• Bug fixes.

What’s new:
• Added a search button to the map editor that allows you to search for a location by address or latitude/longitude. Once chosen then you have the option to add a marker at that location.
• The login password field now has a show/hide button so you can see what you're typing.

Thanks for using HuntStand! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. We fix bugs, clean up our code, and make other improvements.

What’s new:
• Property searches position the pin marking the location so it's visible above the drawer even if detailed info is not available at that location.
• Fixed a bug when declining a hunt area invite.
• Friend Locator was not displaying markers but now it is.

• If an error occurs when trying to accept or decline a hunt area invite then a more detailed message saying what happened will be displayed, if available.
• The hybrid map was mislabeled on the main screen as requiring a Pro subscription.
• Bug fixes.
